description: This file defines the APIs, data types, error codes, and constants used by the Manufacturer Factory Reset (MFR) HAL module in a hardware porting and management context. It includes enums for error codes and image types, structures for serialized data and upgrade status, and function declarations for initialization, data access, image flashing, and firmware management.

methods.name: mfr_init
methods.description: Initializes all internal components responsible for MFR functionalities. Must be called before other APIs.

methods.name: mfr_term
methods.description: Uninitializes the MFR library and its components.

methods.name: mfrGetSerializedData
methods.description: Retrieves serialized Read-Only data from the device based on specified data type.

methods.name: mfrSetSerializedData
methods.description: Sets serialized read-write data on the device for a specified data type.

methods.name: mfrWriteImage
methods.description: Writes a firmware or image file into flash memory, supporting progress notifications and validations.

methods.name: mfrDeletePDRI
methods.description: Deletes the PDRI image if present.

methods.name: mfrScrubAllBanks
methods.description: Deletes platform images from primary and secondary banks.

methods.name: mfrSetBootloaderPattern
methods.description: Sets bootloader LED and backlight patterns for boot sequences.

methods.name: mfrSetBlSplashScreen
methods.description: Updates the primary splash screen image with a specified file.

methods.name: mfrClearBlSplashScreen
methods.description: Clears custom splash screen and reverts to default.

methods.name: mfrGetSecureTime
methods.description: Retrieves secure UTC time from TEE.

methods.name: mfrSetSecureTime
methods.description: Sets secure UTC time in TEE.

methods.name: mfrSetFSRflag
methods.description: Sets the FSR flag in the device's raw EMMC area.

methods.name: mfrGetFSRflag
methods.description: Retrieves the FSR flag from the device's raw EMMC area.
